byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Four days after rival ratings agencies downgraded MF Global to junk status, Standard & Poor's on Monday finally cut the brokerage firm's credit rating to D from BBB-, the same day MF Global filed for bankruptcy protection.
snippet: Four days after rival ratings agencies downgraded MF Global to junk status, Standard & Poor's on Monday finally cut the brokerage firm's credit rating to D from BBB-, the same day MF Global filed for bankruptcy protection.
lead_paragraph: Four days after rival ratings agencies downgraded MF Global to junk status, Standard & Poor's on Monday finally cut the brokerage firm's credit rating to D from BBB-, the same day MF Global filed for bankruptcy protection. Read more »
